data.title: effective batch media transcoding solution
data.meta_description: MediaCoder is a free universal media transcoder, putting together lots of excellent audio/video codecs and tools from the open source community into an all-in-one solution, capable of transcoding among all popular audio/video formats.
data.text:
MediaCoder is a cost-effective solution for batch media transcoding. MediaCoder Premium has all available features and the limited features of MediaCoder plus:

Totally free of in-program ads/sponsorship information

No limit of batch processing tasks

Automation features (automatic transcoding for watch folder)

Access to locked features (marked "Premium Only")

Dedicated download server

MediaCoder Premium is the best choice for for business which involes large volume video transcoding or requires high quality video encoding with automated processing.

Features

MediaCoder Premium has several editions as following.

* Requires GeForce GTX 9 series or above

To learn more about or purchase MediaCoder Premium VOD Edition, please visit this page.

System Requirements

Windows Server 2008/2012/2018, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11

4GB or more system memory

Quad-core processor (or better) recommended

Intel HD4000 or nVidia GeForce GTX 1000 series or better GPUs

Get Your Licence

MediaCoder Premium is licensed per seat (physical computer). Single licence allows one computer to run the software at one time. Multiple seats licence allows multiple computers to run the software at the same time.

For Internet licence, the licence is automatically obtained and validated via Internet on software startup and released on its shutdown.

For USB key licence, a hardware USB key will be provided. USB key licence allows use of software without Internet. Please note that on software start-up, Internet access may still required occasionally for validation. If you want to work in a completely network-less environment, please contact us for instructions.

If you have ever made a donation for MediaCoder, your donation amount can be credited to your purchase of MediaCoder Premium on request.

To get your licence for MediaCoder Premium, choose the type and number of licensed seats and you will be directed to PayPal for payment. Credit/debit card is accepted. Once the payment is completed, your serial number and download link for premium versions will be provided in browser instantly and you can start using licensed software right away.

* You can upgrade your current licence at any time by paying the price difference. Please contact us for upgrading.

** You can request for a full refund within 72 hours if the purchased software does not work for you for any reason.

*** To purchase MediaCoder Premium VOD Edition, please see here.

About USB Key Licence

When USB Key licence is ordered, we will ship you a USB key by DHL eCommerce or DHL Express (with extra cost). Every time you use the software, USB key must be plugged in computer's USB port. An Internet licence will be be provided for temporary use before USB key is delivered.

If you need MediaCoder Premium to work in a complete offline/network-less environment, you must purchase a USB key licence. However, even with the USB key the software still requires Internet connection on program start-up occasionally. If that does not work for you, once you have received the USB key, send us the system code prompted by the program with USB key plugged in and we will send you a licence file to work completely offline (USB key still needed to be plugged in). The licence will be bound to your hardware in this case.

Contact Us
